mapper.select: /* 사용자에게 온 요청 목록 조회 (프로젝트 지원) */ SELECT requests.request_id, requests.request_status, requests.request_date, p.project_id, p.name, p.content, p.status, p.start_at, p.end_at, p.image FROM requests JOIN project_members pm ON requests.project_id = pm.project_id JOIN projects p ON p.project_id = requests.project_id WHERE pm.user_id = #{userId} AND pm.job_title = #{jobTitle} AND requests.request_type = #{requestType} ORDER BY requests.request_date DESC;

/* 사용자에게 온 요청 목록 조회 (협업 제안) */ SELECT requests.request_id, requests.request_status, requests.request_date, p.project_id, p.name, p.content, p.status, p.start_at, p.end_at, p.image FROM requests JOIN projects p ON p.project_id = requests.project_id WHERE requests.user_id = #{userId} AND requests.request_type = #{requestType} ORDER BY request_date DESC;

/* 사용자가 보낸 요청 목록 조회 (프로젝트 지원) */ SELECT requests.request_id, requests.request_status, requests.request_date, p.project_id, p.name, p.content, p.status, p.start_at, p.end_at, p.image FROM requests JOIN projects p ON p.project_id = requests.project_id WHERE requests.user_id = #{userId} AND request_type = #{requestType} ORDER BY request_date DESC;

/* 사용자가 보낸 요청 목록 조회 (협업 제안) */ SELECT requests.request_id, requests.request_status, requests.request_date, p.project_id, p.name, p.content, p.status, p.start_at, p.end_at, p.image FROM requests JOIN projects p ON p.project_id = requests.project_id JOIN project_members pm ON requests.project_id = pm.project_id WHERE pm.user_id = #{userId} AND pm.job_title = #{jobTitle} AND requests.request_type = #{requestType}
